summary: I EXPERIENCED DEATH WOBBLE WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 70MPH AFTER HITTING A ROUGH PATCH OF STRAIGHT ROAD ON THE HIGHWAY.  EXTREMELY VIOLENTLY SHAKING!  I ENDED UP IN THE SHOULDER OF THE ROAD.  I COULD NOT CONTROL THE TRUCK UNTIL I GOT TO A NEAR COMPLETE STOP.  THERE WAS A TOTAL LOSS OF CONTROL.  MIRACULOUSLY AVOIDED A WRECK ON THE HIGHWAY.
